Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers have gone 18-1 at home.
The Thunder are 13-3 in road games.
The Cavaliers are second in the league averaging 122.5 points and are shooting 50.4% from the field.
Oklahoma City is 26-5 when it has fewer turnovers than its opponents and averages 11.1 turnovers per game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 122.5 points per game the Cavaliers score are 19.5 more points than the Thunder allow (103.0).
The Thunder average 115.1 points per game, 4.4 more than the 110.7 the Cavaliers give up to opponents.
Others: Donovan Mitchell is scoring 23.3 points per game with 4.4 rebounds and 4.6 assists for the Cavaliers.
Jalen Williams is averaging 20.6 points, 5.8 rebounds, 5.1 assists and 1.8 steals for the Thunder.
